classification.task_goal: Create a new feature 'confirmed_per_hundred' and build a heatmap showing the percentage of confirmed COVID-19 cases per hundred people in countries.
primary_constraints: Include a 'confirmed_per_hundred' column in the output
Build a heatmap visualizing 'confirmed_per_hundred' by country and date
classification.reasoning: The AI initially used the wrong variable name ('covid_data' instead of 'covid_df') when calculating 'confirmed_per_hundred', which is a violation of the constraints. The user identified this error and requested a fix, leading to a successful repair of the constraint.
